column2: an A.M. Eatery////My boyfriend and I came on a Saturday morning
column3: arriving at about 10:00am. We ran into some friends and in total had a table for 5. Our friends were there maybe 15 minutes before us
column4: and were told an hour to an hour and 15 minute wait
column5: not enough to turn us off. So we waited it out. What's unfortunate was while this was the only horrible experience we really had
column6: it made it the entire experience to takeaway.
